value.name: label
value.tooltip: the string used to match this weapon to an animation mode in the unit carrying it

value.name: maximum alternate shots loaded
value.tooltip: if the second trigger loads alternate ammunition, this is the maximum number of shots that can be loaded at a time

value.name: heat recovery threshold
value.tooltip: the heat value a weapon must return to before leaving the overheated state, once it has become overheated in the first place

value.name: overheated threshold
value.tooltip: the heat value over which a weapon first becomes overheated (should be greater than the heat recovery threshold)

value.name: heat detonation threshold
value.tooltip: the heat value above which the weapon has a chance of exploding each time it is fired

value.name: heat detonation fraction
value.tooltip: the percent chance (between 0.0 and 1.0) the weapon will explode when fired over the heat detonation threshold

value.name: heat loss per second
value.tooltip: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

value.name: heat illumination
value.tooltip: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is overheated

value.name: near reticle range
value.tooltip: the range at which the closer of the two static target reticles will be drawn

value.name: far reticle range
value.tooltip: the range at which the farther of the two static target reticles will be drawn

value.name: intersection reticle range
value.tooltip: the maximum range at which the dynamic target reticle will be drawn

value.name: magnification levels
value.tooltip: the number of magnification levels this weapon allows

value.name: autoaim angle
value.tooltip: the maximum angle that autoaim works at full strength

value.name: autoaim range
value.tooltip: the maximum distance that autoaim works at full strength

value.name: magnetism angle
value.tooltip: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

value.name: magnetism range
value.tooltip: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

value.name: deviation angle
value.tooltip: the maximum angle that a projectile is allowed to deviate from the gun barrel

value.name: forward movement penalty
value.tooltip: percent slowdown to forward movement for units carrying this weapon

value.name: sideways movement penalty
value.tooltip: percent slowdown to sideways and backward movement for units carrying this weapon

value.name: minimum target range
value.tooltip: minimum range that actors using this weapon will try and target stuff at

value.name: looking time modifier
value.tooltip: how much faster actors look around idly using this weapon (zero is unchanged)

value.name: age heat recovery penalty
value.tooltip: how much the weapon's heat recovery is penalized as it ages

value.name: age rate of fire penalty
value.tooltip: how much the weapon's rate of fire is penalized as it ages

value.name: age misfire start
value.tooltip: the age threshold when the weapon begins to misfire

value.name: age misfire chance
value.tooltip: at age 1.0, the misfire chance per shot

value.name: active camo ding
value.tooltip: how much to decrease active camo when a round is fired

value.name: active camo regrowth rate
value.tooltip: how fast to increase active camo (per tick) when a round is fired

value.name: reload time
value.tooltip: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

value.name: chamber time
value.tooltip: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

bit.name: tracks fired projectile
bit.tooltip: poo poo ca ca pee pee

bit.name: random firing effects
bit.tooltip: rather than being chosen sequentially, firing effects are picked randomly

bit.name: can fire with partial ammo
bit.tooltip: allows a weapon to be fired as long as there is a non-zero amount of ammunition loaded

bit.name: does not repeat automatically
bit.tooltip: once fired, this trigger must be released and pressed to fire again

bit.name: locks in onoff state
bit.tooltip: once depressed, this trigger must be released and pressed again to turn it off (and likewise to turn it back on)

bit.name: projectiles use weapon origin
bit.tooltip: instead of coming out of the magic first person camera origin, the projectiles for this weapon actually come out of the gun

bit.name: sticks when dropped
bit.tooltip: if this trigger is pressed when its owner drops the weapon (for whatever reason) this trigger stays down

bit.name: ejects during chamber
bit.tooltip: this trigger's ejection port is started during the key frame of its chamber animation

bit.name: projectile vector cannot be adjusted
bit.tooltip: projectiles fired by this weapon cannot have their direction adjusted by the AI to hit the target

value.name: rounds per second
value.tooltip: the number of firing effects created per second

value.name: acceleration time
value.tooltip: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final rounds per second

value.name: deceleration time
value.tooltip: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return from its final rounds per second to its initial

value.name: blurred rate of fire
value.tooltip: a percentage between 0 and 1 which controls how soon in its firing animation the weapon blurs

value.name: magazine
value.tooltip: the magazine from which this trigger draws its ammunition

value.name: rounds per shot
value.tooltip: the number of rounds expended to create a single firing effect

value.name: minimum rounds loaded
value.tooltip: the minimum number of rounds necessary to fire the weapon

value.name: rounds between tracers
value.tooltip: the number of non-tracer rounds fired between tracers

value.name: firing noise
value.tooltip: how loud this weapon appears to the AI

value.name: error
value.tooltip: the accuracy (between 0.0 and 1.0) of the weapon during firing

value.name: acceleration time2
value.tooltip: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

value.name: deceleration time2
value.tooltip: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

value.name: charging time
value.tooltip: the amount of time it takes for this trigger to become fully charged

value.name: charged time
value.tooltip: the amount of time this trigger can be charged before becoming overcharged

value.name: charged illumination
value.tooltip: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is fully charged

value.name: spew time
value.tooltip: length of time the weapon will spew (fire continuously) while discharging

value.name: charging effect
value.tooltip: the charging effect is created once when the trigger begins to charge

value.name: first person offset
value.tooltip: +x is forward, +z is up, +y is left

value.name: ejection port recovery time
value.tooltip: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the ejection port to transition from 1.0 (open) to 0.0 (closed) after a shot has been fired

value.name: illumination recovery time
value.tooltip: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes the illumination function to transition from 1.0 (bright) to 0.0 (dark) after a shot has been fired

value.name: heat generated per round
value.tooltip: the amount of heat generated each time the trigger is fired

value.name: age generated per round
value.tooltip: the amount the weapon ages each time the trigger is fired

value.name: overload time
value.tooltip: the next trigger fires this often while holding down this trigger

value.name: shot count lower bound
value.tooltip: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

value.name: shot count upper bound
value.tooltip: the maximum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

value.name: firing effect
value.tooltip: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

value.name: misfire effect
value.tooltip: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

value.name: empty effect
value.tooltip: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

value.name: firing damage
value.tooltip: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

value.name: misfire damage
value.tooltip: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

value.name: empty damage
value.tooltip: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

value.name: firing effects
value.tooltip: firing effects determine what happens when this trigger is fired
